Title: Requires the commissioner of education to develop and implement an expanded curriculum or instruction on the history of the labor movement in the United States
Summary: Requires the commissioner of education to develop and implement an expanded curriculum or instruction on the history of the labor movement in the United States.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring the commissioner of education to develop and implement an expanded curriculum or instruction on the history of the labor movement in the United States
